description:
tempest.api.compute.admin.test_volume_swap.TestVolumeSwap.test_volume_swap fail in the XenProject CI loop with:
Details: volume d3c365b1-e7b9-4edd-a769-8a0404fb43c8 failed to reach available status (current in-use) within the required time

I could find in the log screen-n-cpu.log:
ProcessExecutionError: Unexpected error while running command.
Command: iscsiadm -m node -T iqn.2010-10.org.openstack:volume-d3c365b1-e7b9-4edd-a769-8a0404fb43c8 -p 146.20.110.79:3260
Exit code: 21
Stdout: u''
Stderr: u'iscsiadm: No records found\n'

But I'm not sure what the test is doing at this point. Maybe a volume is not ready because the test machine is slow?

An example of the failure can be found here:
http://logs.openstack.xenproject.org/87/449687/3/silent/dsvm-tempest-xen/ecdd7cf/
title: libvirt+xen: test_volume_swap failed
